pageContext.claim: “We're on track to rapidly produce 100 million doses, as soon as the vaccine is approved, and up to 500 million shortly thereafter. So we'll have 600 million doses.”
pageContext.analysis: Dr. Moncef Slaoui, head of Operation Warp Speed, told NPR that he estimated about 20 to 30 million doses of a vaccine — not 100 million — would be ready by the end of the year.
